mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (id, title, description, startDate, endDate, groupCode, isPublic, isAllDay) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{groupCode}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, isAllDay = #{isAllDay} WHERE scheduleId = #{scheduleId}
